sections.content:
Question:
Has the operation of Verified Linux Package (VLP) been verified for partner boards?
Answer:
The only reference board for which the operation of Verified Linux Package (VLP) has been verified is RZ/G2L Evaluation Board Kit. For details on board support packages (BSP) related to partner boards, please contact a partner. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/rz-mpus/rz-partner-solutions#quick-link-2846
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L
